channel.title: How to make NPC's talk in a 525! please help
channel.description: Hey guys im having trouble making NPC's talk in 525, ive looked for some tuts but coudnt find any that helped so if any one knows PLEASE help :D ,thanks

item.title: How to make NPC's talk in a 525! please help
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“gator55555, post:1, topic:365543”]Hey guys im having trouble making NPC’s talk in 525, ive looked for some tuts but coudnt find any that helped so if any one knows PLEASE help ,thanks[/quote]NCP.Xml heres one code:

<monster name="Make-over mage" combat="0" type="599" description="This Is http://www.PPkers.webs.com/"> <action>Talk-to</action>
type=“599” is the npc id…
Discription is what it says…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make NPC's talk in a 525! please help
